WelcomeSubtitle: We give you the tools to start you iot business and do the heavy lifting for you. Signup to get notified when we go live.
Page.Contact.Title: Find out how
Page.Contact.Subtitle: DimensionFour can help your iot
Page.Contact.Body1: We want to hear from you! Whether you’re a potential user with questions about our product or are already using Contentful and have questions about expanding your current package, we’re ready to help.
Page.Contact.Body2: Please note, requests will be qualified and Enterprise organizations will be assigned a dedicated team to assist in their evaluation.
Page.Contact.Body3: Are you an agency interested in becoming a Contentful partner? Reach out to us here. For information about pricing and other subscription issues, visit our pricing page. For answers to all your other Contentful questions, visit our FAQ. If your question is technical and you can’t find the answer in our developer portal, visit our support page.
Page.Pricing.Title: Flexible pricing
Page.Pricing.Subtitle: Pay for only what you use with our transparent pricing model to fit your budget
